title: Strengthening App Development Practice Competencies: Copyright and Media Law: Explicit Instruction and Problem-Solving Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic legal concepts and understanding of the media industry
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of copyright and media law with over 80% accuracy.

Learners can achieve a success rate of over 75% when applying knowledge to new problems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
